cursor.description: An opaque string which acts as a paging token. To obtain the next page of results occurring after a given response set this value to the `cursor` field of the response.

limit.description: The maximum number of records returned. The limit for getEvents can range from 1 to 10000 - an upper limit that is hardcoded in Stellar-RPC for performance reasons. If this argument isn't designated, it defaults to 100.
